title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 §§ 271-7.19 - Poisonous or toxic materials
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 §§ 271-7.19 - Poisonous or toxic materials

State Regulations

Only those poisonous or toxic materials necessary and
intended for the maintenance of the establishment, including the cleaning and
sanitization of equipment and utensils and the control of insects and rodents, shall be present in retail food stores, except those items being stored or
displayed for retail sale as described in section
271-7.23
of this

Subpart. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1
§§
271-7.19

Repealed

New

York State Register June 22, 2016/Volume XXXVIII, Issue 25, eff. 6/22/2016

Adopted

New

York State Register December 21, 2016/Volume XXXVIII, Issue 51, eff. 12/21/2016

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
